actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Select Committee on Indian Affairs (without written report).
Referred to Senate Committee on the Budget.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Budget, S. Rept. 95-1189.

official_title: A resolution waiving section 402 (a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to consideration of H.R. 11092, a bill to amend the Act of December 22, 1974 (88 Stat 1712) relating to the Navajo and Hopi Indian Relocation Commission.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of H.R.11092 (Navajo and Hopi Indian Relocation Commission).

titles.title: A resolution waiving section 402 (a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to consideration of H.R. 11092, a bill to amend the Act of December 22, 1974 (88 Stat 1712) relating to the Navajo and Hopi Indian Relocation Commission.
